description.@en: Rest in peace until you rise again . . .

criticalFailure.@en: The grave or soil swallows them whole, putting them in a Chokehold. Whenever they reach Incapacitated!, they are Slain!.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, a willing person sinks into the soil, falling asleep. They are able to avoid environmental effects of cold, heat, Starvation and Suffocation during this time.

reagents.@en: A grave or the roots of a tree, which you sink into
